input_text.Prompt:
Given a item title and item specifications, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Melrose International Frosted Winterberry Wreath, 26-Inch

Item specifications:
Cedar, with laurel leaves and clumps of white berries with just a light dusting of snow
All stems are wired for easy shaping to full size
Suitable for use inside or outside in a protected area
This wreath adds a touch of warmth to any room or door

Product description:
input_text.Response A: If you want a beautiful wreath to add warmth to any room or door, then buy the Melrose International Frosted Winterberry Wreath. It is made of cedar and with laurel leaves and clumps of white berries with just a light dusting of snow, this wreath a wonderful winter accent for your door or your in-home holiday decorating. Stems are all wired and this beautiful wreath will need some basic shaping upon arrival, 26-inch in diameter.
input_text.Response B: These embroidered iron sew on cotton patches are just an awesome addition to pimp your outfit individually and a great gift as well. Highest embroidery quality and 100% customer satisfaction guaranteed! Please note the measurements displayed in the item picture. We ship from Thailand to any country within 10-14 days by airmail! Free shipping worldwide! As we have more than ten years of experience with this product selling online, you can expect reliable sales and after sales support. Any customer enquiry will be answered within under 12 hours on 365 days a year! These cotton patches can be ironed on cotton material only! For ironing: use a cloth to cover the cotton and underneath the back side of the patch positioned before ironing. Turn the cotton material and the patch around and cover as well with a cloth before ironing. Switch off the steam function of your electric pressing iron! On any other material such as leather and synthetic fabrics the cotton patches must be stitched on!
